mapper.select:
SELECT M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS OBJ_TYPE_ID , M01.OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ID , M01.OBJ_NM AS OBJ_NM --정형분석명\ , CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_USER_OBJ_FVRT_D WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND USER_ID = #{sessionInfo.userId} AND OBJ_TYPE_ID = M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND OBJ_ID = M01.OBJ_ID) > 0 THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS BOOKMARK_YN , CASE WHEN ( SELECT OBJ_TYPE_ID||OBJ_ID FROM ( SELECT A.OBJ_TYPE_ID , A.OBJ_ID , NVL(C.USER_ID,A.PRIV_RCVR_ID) AS USER_ID FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_PRIV_OBJ_R A LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_GRP_R B ON(A.PRIV_RCVR_ID = B.USER_GRP_ID AND A.PRIV_RCVR_GBN='G') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_GRP_USER_R C ON(B.REL_USER_GRP_ID = C.USER_GRP_ID ) ) AUTH WHERE AUTH.USER_ID = #{sessionInfo.userId} AND OBJ_TYPE_ID||OBJ_ID = M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID||M01.OBJ_ID ) = M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID||M01.OBJ_ID THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS AUTH_YN , M01.OBJ_DESC AS OBJ_DESC , M01.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID AS PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , M01.PATH_OBJ_ID AS PATH_OBJ_ID , M02.OBJ_NM AS PATH_OBJ_NM --분류체계명 , D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_101_CD , C1101.CD_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_101_NM --중요도 , D102.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_102_CD , C1102.CD_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_102_NM --활용목적 , D103.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_103_NM , D104.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_104_CD , C1103.CD_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_104_NM --활용주기 , D105.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_105_CD , C1104.CD_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_105_NM --사용자구분 , D106.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_106_CD , U01.USER_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_106_NM --담당자명 , D107.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_107_CD --부서코드 , D01.ORG_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_107_NM --부서명 , D109.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_109_NM , DD108.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS DD108_ATR_VAL -- 인스턴스 연결정보 , DD108.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS DD108_OBJ_TYPE_ID -- 인스턴스 연결정보 , D108.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS D108_ATR_VAL -- 인스턴스 FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M M01 LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M M02 ON (M01.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = M02.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.PATH_OBJ_ID = M02.OBJ_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M M03 ON (M02.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = M03.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M02.PATH_OBJ_ID = M03.OBJ_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D101 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D101.OBJ_ID AND D101.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND D101.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D102 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D102.OBJ_ID AND D102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 AND D102.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D103 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D103.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D103.OBJ_ID AND D103.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 AND D103.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D104 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D104.OBJ_ID AND D104.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 AND D104.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D105 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D105.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D105.OBJ_ID AND D105.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 AND D105.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D106 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D106.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D106.OBJ_ID AND D106.ATR_ID_SEQ = 106 AND D106.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D107 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D107.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D107.OBJ_ID AND D107.ATR_ID_SEQ = 107 AND D107.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D108 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D108.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D108.OBJ_ID AND D108.ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 AND D108.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D109 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D109.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D109.OBJ_ID AND D109.ATR_ID_SEQ = 109 AND D109.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1101 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1101.CD_ID AND C1101.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTIMP') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1102 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1102.CD_ID AND C1102.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTPUR') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1103 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1103.CD_ID AND C1103.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTRCYC') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1104 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1104.CD_ID AND C1104.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTUSRTP') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_USER_M U01 ON (D106.OBJ_ATR_VAL = U01.USER_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_ORG_M D01 ON (D107.OBJ_ATR_VAL = D01.ORG_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D DD108 ON (DD108.OBJ_ID = D108.OBJ_ATR_VAL AND DD108.OBJ_TYPE_ID IN('020500L','020600L') AND DD108.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND DD108.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 ) WHERE 1=1 AND M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010102L' AND M01.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND D102.OBJ_ATR_VAL = ${rGubun}
AND ( UPPER(M01.OBJ_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%' OR UPPER(U01.USER_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%' )
AND UPPER(M01.OBJ_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'
AND UPPER(U01.USER_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'
AND M01.PATH_OBJ_ID IN(${cateIds})
ORDER BY M01.OBJ_ID ASC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS OBJ_TYPE_ID , M01.OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ID , M01.OBJ_NM AS OBJ_NM --정형분석명 , M01.OBJ_DESC AS OBJ_DESC , M01.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID AS PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , M01.PATH_OBJ_ID AS PATH_OBJ_ID , M02.OBJ_NM AS PATH_OBJ_NM --분류체계명 , D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_101_CD , C1101.CD_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_101_NM --중요도 , D102.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_102_CD , C1102.CD_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_102_NM --활용목적 , D103.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_103_NM , D104.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_104_CD , C1103.CD_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_104_NM --활용주기 , D105.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_105_CD , C1104.CD_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_105_NM --사용자구분 , D106.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_106_CD , U01.USER_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_106_NM --담당자명 , D109.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_109_NM , DD108.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS DD108_ATR_VAL -- 인스턴스 연결정보 , DD108.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS DD108_OBJ_TYPE_ID -- 인스턴스 연결정보 , D108.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS D108_ATR_VAL -- 인스턴스 FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M M01 LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M M02 ON (M01.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = M02.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.PATH_OBJ_ID = M02.OBJ_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M M03 ON (M02.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = M03.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M02.PATH_OBJ_ID = M03.OBJ_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D101 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D101.OBJ_ID AND D101.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND D101.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D102 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D102.OBJ_ID AND D102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 AND D102.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D103 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D103.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D103.OBJ_ID AND D103.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 AND D103.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D104 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D104.OBJ_ID AND D104.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 AND D104.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D105 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D105.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D105.OBJ_ID AND D105.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 AND D105.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D106 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D106.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D106.OBJ_ID AND D106.ATR_ID_SEQ = 106 AND D106.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D108 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D108.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D108.OBJ_ID AND D108.ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 AND D108.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D109 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D109.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D109.OBJ_ID AND D109.ATR_ID_SEQ = 109 AND D109.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1101 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1101.CD_ID AND C1101.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTIMP') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1102 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1102.CD_ID AND C1102.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTPUR') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1103 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1103.CD_ID AND C1103.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTRCYC') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1104 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1104.CD_ID AND C1104.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTUSRTP') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_USER_M U01 ON (D106.OBJ_ATR_VAL = U01.USER_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D DD108 ON (DD108.OBJ_ID = D108.OBJ_ATR_VAL AND DD108.OBJ_TYPE_ID IN('020500L','020600L') AND DD108.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND DD108.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 ) WHERE 1=1 AND M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010102L' AND M01.DEL_YN = 'N' ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT OBJ_ID,OBJ_NM,OBJ_DESC FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID='010101L' AND OBJ_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT PATH_OBJ_ID FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID='010102L' )

SELECT NVL(M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID,' ') AS OBJ_TYPE_ID , NVL(M01.OBJ_ID,' ') AS OBJ_ID , NVL(M01.OBJ_NM,' ') AS OBJ_NM --정형분석명 , NVL(M01.OBJ_DESC,' ') AS OBJ_DESC , NVL(M01.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID,' ') AS PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , NVL(M01.PATH_OBJ_ID,' ') AS PATH_OBJ_ID , NVL(M02.OBJ_NM,' ') AS PATH_OBJ_NM --분류체계명 , NVL(D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL,' ') AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_101_CD , NVL(C1101.CD_NM,' ') AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_101_NM --중요도 , NVL(D102.OBJ_ATR_VAL,' ') AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_102_CD , NVL(C1102.CD_NM,' ') AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_102_NM --활용목적 , NVL(D103.OBJ_ATR_VAL,' ') AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_103_NM , NVL(D104.OBJ_ATR_VAL,' ') AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_104_CD , NVL(C1103.CD_NM,' ') AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_104_NM --활용주기 , NVL(D105.OBJ_ATR_VAL,' ') AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_105_CD , NVL(C1104.CD_NM,' ') AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_105_NM --사용자구분 , NVL(D106.OBJ_ATR_VAL,' ') AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_106_CD , NVL(U01.USER_NM,' ') AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_106_NM --담당자명 , NVL(D109.OBJ_ATR_VAL,' ') AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_109_NM , NVL(M10.OBJ_TYPE_ID,' ') AS REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID --010107L 필터 / 010104L 지표 / 010105L 관점 , NVL(M10.OBJ_ID,' ') AS REL_OBJ_ID , NVL(M10.ADM_OBJ_ID, '') AS ADM_OBJ_ID , NVL(DF101.OBJ_ATR_VAL,'') AS F101_ATR_VAL --필터유형 , NVL(DF102.OBJ_ATR_VAL,' ') AS F102_ATR_VAL --필터상세유형 , NVL(DF103.OBJ_ATR_VAL,' ') AS F103_ATR_VAL --구성요소유형 , NVL(DF104.OBJ_ATR_VAL,' ') AS F104_ATR_VAL --구성요소유형상세 , NVL(DF105.OBJ_ATR_VAL,' ') AS F105_ATR_VAL --분석도구IF유형 , NVL(M10.OBJ_NM,' ') AS D_NAME , NVL(M10.OBJ_DESC,' ') AS D_DESC , NVL(DD101.OBJ_ATR_VAL,' ') AS D101_ATR_VAL --관점_샘플데이터 / 지표_산출식 , NVL(DD108.OBJ_ATR_VAL,' ') AS DD108_ATR_VAL -- 인스턴스 연결정보 , NVL(D108.OBJ_ATR_VAL,' ') AS D108_ATR_VAL -- 인스턴스 FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M M01 LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M M02 ON (M01.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = M02.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.PATH_OBJ_ID = M02.OBJ_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M M03 ON (M02.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = M03.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M02.PATH_OBJ_ID = M03.OBJ_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D101 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D101.OBJ_ID AND D101.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND D101.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D102 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D102.OBJ_ID AND D102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 AND D102.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D103 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D103.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D103.OBJ_ID AND D103.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 AND D103.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D104 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D104.OBJ_ID AND D104.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 AND D104.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D105 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D105.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D105.OBJ_ID AND D105.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 AND D105.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D106 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D106.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D106.OBJ_ID AND D106.ATR_ID_SEQ = 106 AND D106.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D108 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D108.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D108.OBJ_ID AND D108.ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 AND D108.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D109 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D109.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D109.OBJ_ID AND D109.ATR_ID_SEQ = 109 AND D109.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1101 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1101.CD_ID AND C1101.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTIMP') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1102 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1102.CD_ID AND C1102.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTPUR') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1103 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1103.CD_ID AND C1103.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTRCYC') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1104 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1104.CD_ID AND C1104.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTUSRTP') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_USER_M U01 ON (D106.OBJ_ATR_VAL = U01.USER_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_R R01 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = R01.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = R01.OBJ_ID AND R01.DEL_YN = 'N') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M M10 ON (R01.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = M10.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND R01.REL_OBJ_ID = M10.OBJ_ID AND M10.OBJ_TYPE_ID IN ('010104L','010105L','010107L') AND M10.DEL_YN = 'N') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D DF101 ON (DF101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010107L' AND M10.OBJ_TYPE_ID = DF101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M10.OBJ_ID = DF101.OBJ_ID AND DF101.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND DF101.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 AND DF101.DEL_YN = 'N') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D DF102 ON (DF101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010107L' AND M10.OBJ_TYPE_ID = DF102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M10.OBJ_ID = DF102.OBJ_ID AND DF102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 AND DF102.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 AND DF102.DEL_YN = 'N') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D DF103 ON (DF101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010107L' AND M10.OBJ_TYPE_ID = DF103.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M10.OBJ_ID = DF103.OBJ_ID AND DF103.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 AND DF103.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 AND DF103.DEL_YN = 'N') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D DF104 ON (DF101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010107L' AND M10.OBJ_TYPE_ID = DF104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M10.OBJ_ID = DF104.OBJ_ID AND DF104.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 AND DF104.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 AND DF104.DEL_YN = 'N') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D DF105 ON (DF101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010107L' AND M10.OBJ_TYPE_ID = DF105.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M10.OBJ_ID = DF105.OBJ_ID AND DF105.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 AND DF105.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 AND DF105.DEL_YN = 'N') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D DD101 ON (DD101.OBJ_TYPE_ID IN ('010105L','010104L') AND M10.OBJ_TYPE_ID = DD101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M10.OBJ_ID = DD101.OBJ_ID AND DD101.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND DD101.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 AND DD101.DEL_YN = 'N') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D DD108 ON (DD108.OBJ_ID = D108.OBJ_ATR_VAL AND DD108.OBJ_TYPE_ID IN('020500L','020600L') AND DD108.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND DD108.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 ) WHERE 1=1 AND M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010102L' AND M01.OBJ_ID = #{reportId} AND M01.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY M10.OBJ_TYPE_ID DESC, M10.OBJ_ID DESC

SELECT C.ADM_OBJ_ID AS TOOL_ID,D.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS TOOL_PWD FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_USER_M A INNER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_USER_OBJ_IF_D B ON(A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID) INNER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M C ON(B.OBJ_TYPE_ID = C.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND B.OBJ_ID = C.OBJ_ID) INNER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D ON(C.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND C.OBJ_ID = D.OBJ_ID AND D.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND D.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) INNER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D E ON(C.PATH_OBJ_ID = E.OBJ_ATR_VAL AND E.ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 AND E.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND D.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '0205U1L' AND E.obj_type_id = '010102L' AND E.OBJ_ID = #{reportId}

SELECT M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS OBJ_TYPE_ID , M01.OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ID , M01.OBJ_NM AS OBJ_NM --정형분석명\ , CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_USER_OBJ_FVRT_D WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND USER_ID = #{sessionInfo.userId} AND OBJ_TYPE_ID = M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND OBJ_ID = M01.OBJ_ID) > 0 THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS BOOKMARK_YN , M01.OBJ_DESC AS OBJ_DESC , M01.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID AS PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , M01.PATH_OBJ_ID AS PATH_OBJ_ID , M02.OBJ_NM AS PATH_OBJ_NM --분류체계명 , D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_101_CD , C1101.CD_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_101_NM --중요도 , D102.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_102_CD , C1102.CD_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_102_NM --활용목적 , D103.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_103_NM , D104.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_104_CD , C1103.CD_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_104_NM --활용주기 , D105.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_105_CD , C1104.CD_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_105_NM --사용자구분 , D106.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_106_CD , U01.USER_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_106_NM --담당자명 , D107.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_107_CD --부서코드 , D01.ORG_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_107_NM --부서명 , D109.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_109_NM , DD108.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS DD108_ATR_VAL -- 인스턴스 연결정보 , DD108.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS DD108_OBJ_TYPE_ID -- 인스턴스 연결정보 , D108.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS D108_ATR_VAL -- 인스턴스 FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M M01 LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M M02 ON (M01.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = M02.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.PATH_OBJ_ID = M02.OBJ_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M M03 ON (M02.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = M03.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M02.PATH_OBJ_ID = M03.OBJ_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D101 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D101.OBJ_ID AND D101.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND D101.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D102 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D102.OBJ_ID AND D102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 AND D102.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D103 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D103.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D103.OBJ_ID AND D103.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 AND D103.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D104 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D104.OBJ_ID AND D104.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 AND D104.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D105 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D105.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D105.OBJ_ID AND D105.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 AND D105.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D106 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D106.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D106.OBJ_ID AND D106.ATR_ID_SEQ = 106 AND D106.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D107 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D107.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D107.OBJ_ID AND D107.ATR_ID_SEQ = 107 AND D107.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D108 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D108.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D108.OBJ_ID AND D108.ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 AND D108.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D109 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D109.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D109.OBJ_ID AND D109.ATR_ID_SEQ = 109 AND D109.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1101 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1101.CD_ID AND C1101.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTIMP') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1102 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1102.CD_ID AND C1102.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTPUR') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1103 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1103.CD_ID AND C1103.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTRCYC') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1104 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1104.CD_ID AND C1104.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTUSRTP') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_USER_M U01 ON (D106.OBJ_ATR_VAL = U01.USER_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_ORG_M D01 ON (D107.OBJ_ATR_VAL = D01.ORG_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D DD108 ON (DD108.OBJ_ID = D108.OBJ_ATR_VAL AND DD108.OBJ_TYPE_ID IN('020500L','020600L') AND DD108.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND DD108.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 ) WHERE 1=1 AND M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010102L' AND M01.DEL_YN = 'N' AND (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID,M01.OBJ_ID) IN ( SELECT OBJ_TYPE_ID, OBJ_ID FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_USER_OBJ_FVRT_D WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND USER_ID = #{sessionInfo.userId} )
AND ( UPPER(M01.OBJ_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%' OR UPPER(U01.USER_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%' )
AND UPPER(M01.OBJ_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'
AND UPPER(U01.USER_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'
AND M01.PATH_OBJ_ID IN(${cateIds})
AND (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID,M01.OBJ_ID) IN ( SELECT OBJ_TYPE_ID,OBJ_ID FROM ( SELECT A.OBJ_TYPE_ID , A.OBJ_ID , NVL(C.USER_ID,A.PRIV_RCVR_ID) AS USER_ID FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_PRIV_OBJ_R A LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_GRP_R B ON(A.PRIV_RCVR_ID = B.USER_GRP_ID AND A.PRIV_RCVR_GBN='G') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_GRP_USER_R C ON(B.REL_USER_GRP_ID = C.USER_GRP_ID ) ) AUTH WHERE AUTH.USER_ID=#{sessionInfo.userId} )
ORDER BY M01.OBJ_ID ASC

SELECT USER_NM FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_USER_M WHERE USER_ID = ( SELECT OBJ_ATR_VAL FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND OBJ_ID = #{objId} AND ATR_ID_SEQ = 106 AND ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 )

SELECT M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS OBJ_TYPE_ID , M01.OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ID , M01.OBJ_NM AS OBJ_NM --정형분석명\ , CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_USER_OBJ_FVRT_D WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND USER_ID = #{sessionInfo.userId} AND OBJ_TYPE_ID = M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND OBJ_ID = M01.OBJ_ID) > 0 THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS BOOKMARK_YN , M01.OBJ_DESC AS OBJ_DESC , M01.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID AS PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , M01.PATH_OBJ_ID AS PATH_OBJ_ID , M02.OBJ_NM AS PATH_OBJ_NM --분류체계명 , D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_101_CD , C1101.CD_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_101_NM --중요도 , D102.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_102_CD , C1102.CD_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_102_NM --활용목적 , D103.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_103_NM , D104.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_104_CD , C1103.CD_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_104_NM --활용주기 , D105.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_105_CD , C1104.CD_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_105_NM --사용자구분 , D106.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_106_CD , U01.USER_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_106_NM --담당자명 , D107.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_107_CD --부서코드 , D01.ORG_NM AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_107_NM --부서명 , D109.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OBJ_ATR_VAL_109_NM , DD108.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS DD108_ATR_VAL -- 인스턴스 연결정보 , DD108.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS DD108_OBJ_TYPE_ID -- 인스턴스 연결정보 , D108.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS D108_ATR_VAL -- 인스턴스 FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M M01 LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M M02 ON (M01.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = M02.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.PATH_OBJ_ID = M02.OBJ_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M M03 ON (M02.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = M03.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M02.PATH_OBJ_ID = M03.OBJ_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D101 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D101.OBJ_ID AND D101.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND D101.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D102 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D102.OBJ_ID AND D102.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 AND D102.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D103 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D103.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D103.OBJ_ID AND D103.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 AND D103.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D104 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D104.OBJ_ID AND D104.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 AND D104.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D105 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D105.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D105.OBJ_ID AND D105.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 AND D105.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D106 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D106.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D106.OBJ_ID AND D106.ATR_ID_SEQ = 106 AND D106.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D107 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D107.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D107.OBJ_ID AND D107.ATR_ID_SEQ = 107 AND D107.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D108 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D108.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D108.OBJ_ID AND D108.ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 AND D108.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D D109 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D109.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = D109.OBJ_ID AND D109.ATR_ID_SEQ = 109 AND D109.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1101 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1101.CD_ID AND C1101.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTIMP') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1102 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1102.CD_ID AND C1102.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTPUR') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1103 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1103.CD_ID AND C1103.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTRCYC') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M C1104 ON (D101.OBJ_ATR_VAL = C1104.CD_ID AND C1104.CD_GRP_ID = 'BM_RPTUSRTP') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_USER_M U01 ON (D106.OBJ_ATR_VAL = U01.USER_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_ORG_M D01 ON (D107.OBJ_ATR_VAL = D01.ORG_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D DD108 ON (DD108.OBJ_ID = D108.OBJ_ATR_VAL AND DD108.OBJ_TYPE_ID IN('020500L','020600L') AND DD108.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND DD108.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT OBJ_TYPE_ID, OBJ_ID, CRET_DT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY OBJ_ID ORDER BY CRET_DT DESC) ROW_NUM, OBJ_TYPE_ID, OBJ_ID, CRET_DT FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_REPORT_HISTORY_D WHERE USER_ID = #{sessionInfo.userId} ORDER BY CRET_DT DESC ) WHERE ROW_NUM = 1) R01 ON (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = R01.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M01.OBJ_ID = R01.OBJ_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010102L' AND M01.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND ( UPPER(M01.OBJ_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%' OR UPPER(U01.USER_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%' )
AND UPPER(M01.OBJ_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'
AND UPPER(U01.USER_NM) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'
AND M01.PATH_OBJ_ID IN(${cateIds})
AND (M01.OBJ_TYPE_ID,M01.OBJ_ID) IN ( SELECT OBJ_TYPE_ID,OBJ_ID FROM ( SELECT A.OBJ_TYPE_ID , A.OBJ_ID , NVL(C.USER_ID,A.PRIV_RCVR_ID) AS USER_ID FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_PRIV_OBJ_R A LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_GRP_R B ON(A.PRIV_RCVR_ID = B.USER_GRP_ID AND A.PRIV_RCVR_GBN='G') LEFT OUTER JOIN O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_GRP_USER_R C ON(B.REL_USER_GRP_ID = C.USER_GRP_ID ) ) AUTH WHERE AUTH.USER_ID=#{sessionInfo.userId} )
ORDER BY R01.CRET_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_USER_OBJ_FVRT_D (USER_ID, SEQ_ID, DEL_YN, CRET_DT, CRETR_ID, CHG_DT, CHGR_ID, OBJ_TYPE_ID, OBJ_ID) VALUES (#{sessionInfo.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seqId}, 'N', SYSDATE, #{sessionInfo.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{sessionInfo.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objTypeId}, #{objId})
mapper.delete: DELETE O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_USER_OBJ_FVRT_D WHERE USER_ID = #{sessionInfo.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND OBJ_ID = #{objId}
